Text: installation asks to insert disc, how do i burn disc? when i try to burn it to disc i get message that there is not enough disc space? any help would be greatly appreciated as this happens to me alot.

@nvr8nuf stop trying to burn dual layer isos on regular DVD-Rs for one.  Or stop burning discs period.  Just mount the iso with alcohol or daemon tools and install then delete it.  If you need it again, download it again.  If it's really that important that you think you need a copy, then go buy it.
